settings.mat_text:
Finished at ourmanufacturer MerchYou in Slovakia, Bratislava; produced by a Fair WearFoundation Leader Stanley/Stella in Bangladesh. Learn more

Composition:

85% organicring - spun combed cotton 

15% recycledpolyester 

Organic cotton

Cottonrepresents nearly half the fibre used in the textile industry and only part ofit is what’s called organic cotton. If sustainably and ethically produced,organic cotton is a great alternative to conventional cotton and it’s likelythe most popular choice for an eco-textile. Contrary to conventional cotton, ituses far less water, no insecticides, reduces contamination of groundwater,poses no risk of cancer to workers, and encourages biodiversity. Globally,conventional cotton cultivation accounts for about 5% of global pesticide useeven though it is cultivated only on about 2.5% of global arable land. From acircularity perspective, being a natural fiber, it has the added benefits ofbeing 100% biodegradable, given there were no harmful chemicals used during theprocessing of the fiber. Certain certifications can help with the evaluation.The Global Organic Textile Standard (GOTS), covers the processing,manufacturing, packaging, labelling, trading and distribution of textiles,ensuring that both environmental and social standards, such as safe andhygienic working conditions, no workplace discrimination and fair pay rates,are respected. This isn’t however the only certification focusing on organiccotton. There are also others like Organic Content Standard (OCS), Cotton madein Africa Organic, the EU Organic Standard, bioRe Sustainable Cotton or theFairtrade Cotton. 

Recycledpolyester

Recycled polyester is a better alternative to avirgin polyester. It is made of recycled plastic bottles or old clothes. Usingrecycled instead of virgin polyester reduces our dependency on fossil fuels,requires less energy, and produces fewer carbon emissions. By using plasticwaste, it is diverted from oceans and landfills. The problem of releasing themicrofibers and biodegradability remains the same though, which is why weencourage you to use the microplastic filters in your washing machine like here or microplastic bags like here

settings.product_care_value:
-Cold wash at 30 degrees

-Do not tumble dry, air dry instead
-Do not bleach, embrace all colours-Do not dry clean
-Iron low heat at 110 degrees or wear rumpled proudly

-Use a laundry bag, stop microplastic pollution

-Never stop exploring, but explore responsibly

This product contains recycled polyester, which releases microfibers to soil and
oceans, which is why we encourage you to use the microplastic filters in your
washing machine like here or microplastic bags like here.

settings.product_sustainability_value:
Conscious choice

We believe that conscious purchases are the best. This is why we encourage you to buy a gift card, instead of a surprise gift. This way you and your loved one knows, that the selected product is really thought through and will be used for long.

settings.shipping_returns_value:
Shipping Costs

We offer free shipping for orders above 150 EUR. For orders below we will add a shipping cost of 4,95 EUR in Germany or according cost from our price list per each European country. For detailed information read our Shipping & Returns page.

Delivery Times

Our delivery times are 2-4 days within Germany and 3-7 days within Europe. All orders are processed at our main hub in Füssen, Germany.

Return Policy

Our gift cards are not a subject of return and can not be returned after the purchase. This is why we ask you for a thought through decision. Go to our Shipping & Returns page to
read more on our return details.

settings.title_sub_text: Sometimes a gift of choice is the most precious one. Let your loved ones choose themselves what they like the most. No more unwanted gifts. Say YES to useful and thought through gifts instead. :)
